title: Fuse solid kurta with statement jewellery to stand out this Diwali
text: It’s officially that time of the year when you open your closet and magically hope for a new outfit for every festive event on your social calendar. While that dreamy wish may not turn true, here’s a styling hack that will help you get through the endless Diwali parties. Invest in solid coloured kurtas in various hues, patterns and textures. Pair them with statement necklaces, earrings, rings and all the other trinkets you can borrow from your mother’s heirloom collection. The idea is to keep the silhouette basic and fuss-free, so you can dramatise your look with jewellery, hair and makeup. Take a cue from these Bollywood ladies who have effortlessly worked this formula on multiple occasions.
description: Anushka Sharma and Sonam Kapoor Ahuja working the solid kurta and statement jewellery trend. Here’s all you need to know.
